contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 28, 1920 D Markinch Contest
Markinch Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Markinch Contest markinch-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Markinch, Fife, Scotland, UK Own choice "National Airs" test piece
12 bands competed
Prizes: £20, £15, £10, £8, £5, £2
Cowdenbeath has a charabanc crash en route to the contest, and one of their instruments was smashed. Bowhill supplied a replacement.
Aug. 6, 2013, 2:49 p.m. Dec. 2, 2013, 10:49 p.m.
1 Arbroath Instrumental Robert Rimmer
2 Falkirk Trades Robert Rimmer
3 Buckhaven and District Miners' Charles Terris
4 Dunnikier Colliery Robert Rimmer
5 Bowhill Colliery and District Silver Band J. Johnstone
6 Longannet Colliery (Cowdenbeath) John Haldane
Withdrawn Barry, Ostlere & Shepherd Unknown
